svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 7 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 7, 2024" date: "2024-09-07"
Eth News and Links
CFTC regulation by enforcement & EF Research AMA
All core devs
â€¢ All Core Devs â€“ Consensus (ACDC) #141 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-2 : Prysm
fixed finality bug, deprecated Pectra-devnet-3 : testing locally with ready clients, launch next week
EIP7685 execution layer requests : proposed change to return requests as opaque hex bytes, review at
ACDE EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposed change to queue deposit requests to avoid consensus
layer DoS PeerDAS : PeerDAS-devnet-2 : testing locally with subset of clients, launch soon Blob proof
generation timing: discussed options for local builders with lower spec hardware, proposal to
pre-prepare blobs on consensus layer Remove SSZ unions from consensus spec proposal (not used in
production)
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-2 : Prysm fixed finality bug, deprecated
Pectra-devnet-3 : testing locally with ready clients, launch next week EIP7685 execution layer
requests : proposed change to return requests as opaque hex bytes, review at ACDE EIP6110 validator
deposits onchain : proposed change to queue deposit requests to avoid consensus layer DoS PeerDAS :
PeerDAS-devnet-2 : testing locally with subset of clients, launch soon Blob proof generation timing:
discussed options for local builders with lower spec hardware, proposal to pre-prepare blobs on
consensus layer Remove SSZ unions from consensus spec proposal (not used in production)
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-2 : Prysm fixed finality bug, deprecated
Pectra-devnet-2 : Prysm fixed finality bug, deprecated
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-3 : testing locally with ready clients, launch next week
Pectra-devnet-3 : testing locally with ready clients, launch next week
â€¢ EIP7685 execution layer requests : proposed change to return requests as opaque hex bytes, review at
ACDE
â€¢ EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposed change to queue deposit requests to avoid consensus
layer DoS
EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposed change to queue deposit requests to avoid consensus
â€¢ PeerDAS : PeerDAS-devnet-2 : testing locally with subset of clients, launch soon Blob proof
pre-prepare blobs on consensus layer
PeerDAS :
â€¢ PeerDAS-devnet-2 : testing locally with subset of clients, launch soon
PeerDAS-devnet-2 : testing locally with subset of clients, launch soon
â€¢ Blob proof generation timing: discussed options for local builders with lower spec hardware,
proposal to pre-prepare blobs on consensus layer
Blob proof generation timing: discussed options for local builders with lower spec hardware, proposal
to pre-prepare blobs on consensus layer
â€¢ Remove SSZ unions from consensus spec proposal (not used in production)
Remove SSZ unions from consensus spec proposal (not used in production)
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Pectra testing call #3
Pectra testing call #3
â€¢ EOF implementers call #57 : discussed EIP7761 ISCONTRACT & alternatives to support ERC721/1155 safe
transfer
EOF implementers call #57 : discussed EIP7761 ISCONTRACT & alternatives to support ERC721/1155 safe
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #7 : blob proofs could take up to 1 second to compute
PeerDAS breakout #7 : blob proofs could take up to 1 second to compute
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Research
â€¢ EF Research AMA on r/Ethereum: ETH value accrual , L1 scaling , blob price discovery , L2 sequencer
decentralization , zk research , credible neutrality , issuance , EF runway , pivot Fusaka upgrade
from Verkle and more
EF Research AMA on r/Ethereum:
â€¢ ETH value accrual , L1 scaling , blob price discovery , L2 sequencer decentralization , zk research
, credible neutrality , issuance , EF runway , pivot Fusaka upgrade from Verkle and more
â€¢ ERC4337 embedded fee markets , solutions to prevent users from overpaying
ERC4337 embedded fee markets , solutions to prevent users from overpaying
Client Releases
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v3.0.0-alpha3 : 30% reduction of latest state, 2x reduction in chaindata, 2x
less RAM & prune doesn't impact chain-tip performance; resync required
â€¢ Erigon v3.0.0-alpha3 : 30% reduction of latest state, 2x reduction in chaindata, 2x less RAM & prune
doesn't impact chain-tip performance; resync required
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum Stylus live on Arbitrum One & Nova, adds Web Assembly VM, write contracts in languages that
compile into WASM such as Rust, composable with EVM contracts
Arbitrum Stylus live on Arbitrum One & Nova, adds Web Assembly VM, write contracts in languages that
â€¢ Base plan to increase gas target by 1 Mgas/s weekly towards goal of 1 Ggas/s Blobspace saturation
projected for February
Base plan to increase gas target by 1 Mgas/s weekly towards goal of 1 Ggas/s
â€¢ Blobspace saturation
â€¢ Matter Labs (ZKsync) laid off ~16% of team
Matter Labs (ZKsync) laid off ~16% of team
For Stakers
â€¢ Geth node on Banana Pi BPI-F3 RISCV board , consensus clients struggle to run currently
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7762 : Increase MIN_BASE_FEE_PER_BLOB_GAS (to speed up
price discovery)
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7762 : Increase MIN_BASE_FEE_PER_BLOB_GAS (to speed up price discovery)
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7763 : App keys for fully embedded accounts ERC7764 : Buyer-seller
negotiable pricing
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7763 : App keys for fully embedded accounts
ERC7763 : App keys for fully embedded accounts
â€¢ ERC7764 : Buyer-seller negotiable pricing
ERC7764 : Buyer-seller negotiable pricing
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Solidity v0.8.27 : require with custom errors, caching of optimized IR for faster compilation and
parser support for transient storage variables
Solidity v0.8.27 : require with custom errors, caching of optimized IR for faster compilation and
â€¢ Scaffold-ETH 2 extensions hackathon finalists
Scaffold-ETH 2 extensions hackathon finalists
â€¢ EVMole v0.4 (function selector extractor): improved accuracy of function state mutability extraction
and improved speed for Python & JavaScript
EVMole v0.4 (function selector extractor): improved accuracy of function state mutability extraction
â€¢ Supersim : simulate interoperable OP Stack Superchain locally
Supersim : simulate interoperable OP Stack Superchain locally
â€¢ CTF Challenges : Uniswap V2 ERC4626 vulnerable vault
CTF Challenges : Uniswap V2 ERC4626 vulnerable vault
Security
â€¢ Penpie $27M exploit on mainnet & Arbitrum via reentrancy
Penpie $27M exploit on mainnet & Arbitrum via reentrancy
â€¢ L2 DAI deployer compromised allowing attacker to deploy contracts on other L2s with same address as
DAI on Optimism & Arbitrum
L2 DAI deployer compromised allowing attacker to deploy contracts on other L2s with same address as
â€¢ Vyper compiler added to EF bounty program
Vyper compiler added to EF bounty program
Ecosystem
â€¢ Devcon community hub proposals
Devcon community hub proposals
â€¢ ETHAccra hackathon projects
ETHAccra hackathon projects
Job Listings
â€¢ Status free.technology is hiring a Business Developer . More jobs at IFT!
Status free.technology is hiring a Business Developer . More jobs at IFT!
â€¢ Nomos is hiring Business Developer , Rust Engineer & Applied Researcher !
Nomos is hiring Business Developer , Rust Engineer & Applied Researcher !
â€¢ Join Witnet as a Community Builder ! Full-time, remote opportunity.
Join Witnet as a Community Builder ! Full-time, remote opportunity.
â€¢ Gnosis seek CoreDevs , Sr Algorithm Engineer , Sr Smart Contract Engineer
Gnosis seek CoreDevs , Sr Algorithm Engineer , Sr Smart Contract Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.4 to 53.4 gwei, 3.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.0
gwei 16k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 0.4 to 53.4 gwei, 3.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.0 gwei
Gas: 0.4 to 53.4 gwei, 3.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.0 gwei
â€¢ 16k ETH net issuance this week
16k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,165 - $2,548, currently $2,233, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,165 - $2,548, currently $2,233, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.041 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.041 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Euler v2 live, modular lending, use vaults as collateral in other vaults
Euler v2 live, modular lending, use vaults as collateral in other vaults
â€¢ Lextek v0: onchain legal forms live on Base, starting with SAFE & DEAL (escrow & invoicing)
Lextek v0: onchain legal forms live on Base, starting with SAFE & DEAL (escrow & invoicing)
â€¢ Snapshot v2 : discussions view, delegate dashboard and improved voting/proposal UX, beta
Snapshot v2 : discussions view, delegate dashboard and improved voting/proposal UX, beta
â€¢ Atomic : exercise challenges live on Base, stake USDC, log Strava workouts & claim stake
Atomic : exercise challenges live on Base, stake USDC, log Strava workouts & claim stake
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ CFTC regulation by enforcement: Dissent by Commissioner Mersinger & Commissioner Pham of Uniswap
enforcement for not blocking leverage tokens
CFTC regulation by enforcement:
â€¢ Dissent by Commissioner Mersinger & Commissioner Pham of Uniswap enforcement for not blocking
leverage tokens
â€¢ Kalshi won against CFTC to list prediction market for control of US congress
Kalshi won against CFTC to list prediction market for control of US congress
â€¢ Galois Capital settled with SEC for using a disclosed non-qualified custodian when the SEC wonâ€™t
approve custodians
Galois Capital settled with SEC for using a disclosed non-qualified custodian when the SEC wonâ€™t
â€¢ FBI : North Korea targeting crypto projects via social engineering
FBI : North Korea targeting crypto projects via social engineering
General
â€¢ Vitalik: glue & coprocessor architecture , central glue (high generality but low efficiency)
shuttles data between coprocessors (low generality buy high efficiency) e.g. EVM & precompiles
Vitalik: glue & coprocessor architecture , central glue (high generality but low efficiency) shuttles
data between coprocessors (low generality buy high efficiency) e.g. EVM & precompiles
â€¢ EUCLEAK : Infineon ECDSA side-channel vulnerability, requires physical access, impacts some YubiKeys
EUCLEAK : Infineon ECDSA side-channel vulnerability, requires physical access, impacts some YubiKeys
â€¢ Notes on extractable witness encryption for KZG commitments and efficient Laconic OT
Notes on extractable witness encryption for KZG commitments and efficient Laconic OT
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
